title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin points out the flaws with the Lakers after their total collapse against the Thunder without LeBron James. He explains why Baker Mayfield is desperate to return from a shoulder injury with back up Case Keenum stepping up to take his place. He also believes despite all the mounting pressure, Dolphins QB Tua Tagovailoa still has time to prove he is a true franchise QB. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst and Pro Bowl Tight End Greg Olsen joins the show to talk about the Packers offense without Davante Adams.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
